I'm happy to help you with your jewelry dilemma!

A gold chain belt can be a great addition to your jewelry collection, but it might not be the best match for your new earrings. Since your earrings are silver with crystals, a gold chain belt might clash with the different metal tone. Mixing metals can be done, but it's essential to consider the overall aesthetic you want to achieve.

If you want to complement your earrings, you might consider a silver chain belt or a necklace that matches the metal tone and style of your earrings. This will create a cohesive look and make your earrings stand out.

On the other hand, if you want to add some contrast to your outfit, you could try pairing your silver earrings with a gold chain belt. This can create a stylish, eclectic look, but it's essential to balance the two metals with other elements in your outfit.

Before making a decision, consider your personal style, the outfits you plan to wear with the belt or necklace, and the overall aesthetic you want to achieve. You might also want to read reviews, check the quality, and look at the return policies of the Amazon seller before making a purchase.

Remember, jewelry is all about expressing your personal style and having fun with it!
